### 1. Load libraries

```{r}

pacman::p_load(plotly, DT, patchwork, tidyverse, readxl, gifski, gapminder)

```

### 2. Import Data

```{r}

exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)

```

```{r}
plot_ly(data = exam_data,
        x = ~ENGLISH,
        y = ~MATHS,
        color = ~RACE,
        colors = "Set3",
        type = "scatter",
        mode = "markers"
        )
```

```{r}
p <- ggplot(data=exam_data, 
            aes(x = MATHS,
                y = ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = RACE), size = 1) +
  coord_cartesian(xlim = c(-100, 100),
                  ylim = c(-100, 100))
ggplotly(p)
```
